description:
Gecko Moria`s minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy`s shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Belief Worth Begging to Live For!! Brook Defends His Afro!
Assez de conviction pour supplier pour sa vie ! Brook protège sa coupe afro !
Shinnen no Inochigoi!! Afro o Mamoru Brook
Убеждённая мольба о жизни! Брук защищает своё афро
إيمان جدير بالتوسل للحياة من أجله! بروك يحمي تسريحته الأفرو!
信念の命乞い!! アフロを守るブルック
